content: So @T-lang/WG-meta -- owing to a last minute family obligation, I won't be able to make the meeting this week, and I know that @Yoshua Wuyts can't either (travel). I'm inclined therefore to cancel. I have been putting a lot of thought into some kind of pre-rfc proposal, though. I'll see if I can put some thoughts into a gist or blog post instead and post it so maybe we can discuss or at least ponder a bit async?
